landingPage.title: Your crypto investments tracked in one place
landingPage.subtitle: Check all your crypto investments in one place. View your historic returns and composition of your portfolio at all times.

refresh.title: Daily refresh of the value of all your wallets.
refresh.description: You can add as many accounts as you want. We have integrated multiple exchanges and wallets. In case you want to track manually, you can add your crypto holdings manually.

money.title: Analize the retuns of each cryptocurrency.
money.description: Gather in one single place all your cryptocurrency investments so you can check where you are earning the most and where you should take action.

dataLine.title: Use the graphs to select diferent dates and compare your holdings value.
dataLine.description: Use the historic information gathered and compare the performance of every wallet in one place and save a lot of time.

actions.thirdStep: Analyze the performance of your investments

lastCall.text: You are just one step away from starting to control your investments and messuring the returns over time.
lastCall.quote: "You can't manage what you dont measure"

validation.password: Password should at least have 8 characters

recoverForm.title: We will send you a code to your email so you can recover your password.

registerForm.title: Register so you can track all your crypto portfolio

dashboardView.title: Dashboard
dashboardView.noWallets: You haven't registered any wallets or cryptocurrencies in your account. Please connect one or add cryptocurrencies manually to start working.
dashboardView.noWalletRegister: There is no information available for the wallen on this date
